About the game: I'LL fly over a thousand platforms until I get back to the brightly lit place. The Symbolism Six Scene Each scene is relative. And you know the first and the last ? Orchard to Chase Inspiring by the film Crouching Tiger Hidden Dragon , we make a orchard scene and you can run over it on the top of the roof of trees. A Run-to-all game Playing Actually 1000 stages is designed to be a walking simulator with some mysticism. It is not easy to keep silence for the long journey, so you may feel boring especially you have less patient. A Easy-to-win Playing Meeting, going and wining, it is very easy to win the final. However, somebody feel it is horrible for a 1000 step walking. Minimalism Style There no any instrument or even emotion by your role. So if you wish a high-cost game or sufficient story, for example, killing a dragon, rescue a princess, fantasy equipment, you should consider a famous one, which is give a more memorable experience for you. Collect Your Unhappiness Sometimes, unhappiness is important for it be an opportunity for us to review ourselves. And both it is possible for playing 1000 stages insides happiness or unhappiness. And 1000 stages will turn your unhappiness to calm and intelligence. It is welcome for you judgement, critique, interpret or any commentation, which may help many people. Hints for buying: It is possible that refunds in 14days in steam. / Free feel to refunds if you don't like our game. This is not a 3D game, the cover is for reference only.
